original_dialogue.patient: Hi Doctor, I am having Chest tightness.
original_dialogue.doctor: Oh, do you have any Expectoration?
Oh, do you have any Pain behind the breastbone?
In that case, you have Esophagitis.

gpt3_output_with_improvement.patient: Hi Doctor, I am having Chest tightness.
gpt3_output_with_improvement.doctor: Do you have any difficulty in swallowing?
Well, then do you have any pain in the breast?
Are you sure? What about an acid reflux?

gpt3_output_with_improvement.patient: No, I don't think so. I never really had any problems with that.
gpt3_output_with_improvement.doctor: Okay then, do you have any stomach ache?

gpt3_output_with_improvement.patient: Yes, I occasionally, have stomach pain.
gpt3_output_with_improvement.doctor: Well, this means you might have Esophagitis.

issue: GPT-3 does not seem to have any issues with the diagnosis.
improvement: GPT3 is now able to question more precisely around the symptoms that a possible disease might have. In the above example, GPT-3 asks the patient if they have symptoms which are related to a disease that could have chest tightness as a symptom and thereby ends up making the right diagnosis.
